long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is RAADS-R?
The Ritvo Autism Asperger Diagnostic Scale-Revised (RAADS-R) is a validated psychological assessment tool designed to assist in the diagnosis of autism spectrum disorders in adults.
Extension Features:
✓ Quick 10-question preview of the RAADS-R assessment
✓ User-friendly interface with clear, easy-to-understand questions
✓ Instant response recording
✓ Simple navigation between questions
✓ Clean, modern design optimized for accessibility
Why Try Our Extension?
This extension offers a convenient preview of the RAADS-R assessment, allowing you to experience the test format and question style. It's perfect for:
Individuals curious about autism spectrum assessments
Healthcare professionals wanting to demonstrate the test to clients
Anyone interested in understanding the RAADS-R format

note：This test is a self-test only, please consult your doctor for detailed advice
